item.title: Trading data
item.description: eodhistoricaldata.com https://eodhistoricaldata.com/ Only EOD data allowed for free users. Historical dividends API provides Ex-dividend date Declaration date Record date Payment date Value Unadjusted Value Dividend currency API for bulk of data for a given day (all companies): https://eodhistoricaldata.com/financial-apis/bulk-api-eod-splits-dividends/
